name: Teva Jadito Universal Sandals - Women's
description:
Stylish and comfortable, a new spin on a classic Teva’s design. The contoured straps and  generous memory foam footbeds add comfort to every step.Fast drying straps made from recycled plastic.Simple hook-and-loop closure.EVA foam midsole provides ample cushioning.Grippy, durable rubber outsole.

        Sustainability
